document.full_text: national safety inspectors have found evidence of "widespread cracking" and fatigue on the fuselage of a southwest airlines boeing 737 that made an emergency landing in arizona with a hole in the cabin, a government official said on sunday.
document.title: "widespread cracking" found on southwest plane
lines_and_colors: national safety inspectors have found evidence of "widespread cracking" and fatigue on the fuselage of a southwest airlines boeing 737 that made an emergency landing in arizona with a hole in the cabin, a government official said on sunday.
